column17:
Joop Pour Femme Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2800

Wild yet subtle this spicy Oriental fragrance reminds you of a walk in the woods replete with a multitude of heady aromas. This is famed French perfumer Michel Almairacâ€™s offering to the woman who cherishes her lady-like demeanor but embraces her wild side. She walks into the room demanding undivided attention and revels in the powers of her feminine charm. This luxury Eau de Toilette accentuates all that she stands for all that she is capable of.

Joop Pour Femme opens with a rush of aldehydes bergamot and lemon; the subtle redolence of coriander adds just the right pinch of spice to the top note. Fruity orange blossom fresh jasmine and Lily of the Valley combine with the velvety touch of rose to make an exhilarating heart note. This tapers down to a titillating base note of creamy sandalwood tonka bean amber patchouli musk civet oakmoss. Rich vanilla and woodsy cedar accentuate the departing base note and adds depth to this spicy scent.

Encased in a simple vial that showcases the potent scent within the fragrance brings back memories of the good old times. Joop Pour Femme is the fragrance of a woman who likes the calm but loves the turbulence.
